description: Detects the stopping of a Windows service
author: Jakob Weinzettl
oscd.community
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: There are many legitimate reasons to stop a service. This rule isn't looking for any suspicious behaviour in particular. Filter legitimate activity accordingly
name: Stop Windows Service Via Net.EXE
query: (((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("net.exe" OR "net1.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:("*\\net.exe" OR "*\\net1.exe"))) AND process.command_line.text:"*\ stop\ *")
